snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes Amazon Publishing selling e-books in other digital bookstores, an excerpt from a book about the hacker group...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes Amazon Publishing selling e-books in other digital bookstores, an excerpt from a book about the hacker group Anonymous and a drawing game that uses face tracking.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Anonymous Attack and Facebook Decisions
